mapper.sql: a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.id AS "id", a.dilivery_date AS "diliveryDate", a.file AS "file", a.address AS "address", a.phone_number AS "phoneNumber", a.fee AS "fee", a.status AS "status", a.keepon_date AS "keeponDate", a.keepon_status AS "keeponStatus"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_express( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, id, dilivery_date, file, address, phone_number, fee, status, keepon_date, keepon_status ) VALUES ( #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{id}, #{diliveryDate}, #{file}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{fee}, #{status}, #{keeponDate}, #{keeponStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bg_express SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, dilivery_date = #{diliveryDate}, file = #{file}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, fee = #{fee}, status = #{status}, keepon_date = #{keeponDate}, keepon_status = #{keeponStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
